title: Cheesy Tuna Bake
ingredients: ['60g butter', '1 large onion, diced finely', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '350ml milk', "250g frozen spinach, cooked according to packet's instructions", '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 (400g) tin tuna in brine, drained', 'cracked pepper to taste (optional)', '55g grated mature Cheddar cheese', 'For the Topping', '2 large potatoes, cooked and sliced', '300ml soured cream', 'grated mature Cheddar cheese as needed']
